_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:47:55 using v2.1
title: What are patients' overall experiences of NHS dentistry care?
analysis_commentary: In 2012/2013 the majority of patients said that they had a very (47.6%) or fairly good (36.3%) experience of NHS dentistry services. However, there are still over 7% of patients that had a poor experience, which translates to over 20,000 patients. This pattern seems to remain fairly consistent in the July 2013 / March 2014 data.
